base_template.name: Bootstrap Base
base_template.html:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <style>
            {{css}}
        </style>
        <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.0.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-EVSTQN3/azprG1Anm3QDgpJLIm9Nao0Yz1ztcQTwFspd3yD65VohhpuuCOmLASjC" crossorigin="anonymous">
    </head>
    <body>
        {% block content %}{% endblock %}
        {% block header %}{% endblock %}
    </body>
</html>

template.name: Antivirus Report
template.template_md:
{% block content %}

Audit Log

{% for item in data_sources.agentsList %} {% endfor %}
Device Name User Device OS Antivirus
{{ item.hostname }} {{ item.last_logged_in_user }} {{ item.operating_system }} {{ item.custom_fields.Antivirus }}
{% endblock %}
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agentsList:
    filter:
      site__client_id: "{{client.id}}"
    custom_fields:
      - Antivirus
    model: agent
    only:
      - hostname
      - operating_system
      - site__name
      - last_logged_in_user
